metadata.name: SHM-P-01 Apophis
metadata.description:
Apophis is a prototype Steel Hammer Machinery unit deployed for close quarter combat, it utilizes a standard 360 degree cockpit with motion sensor installed on the seat.

Developed for research without any weapon equipped

Name : SHM-P-01 Apophis
Weight : 70 metric tons
Operator : SHM
Engine : Matronicks MK 1
